events.text:
Hey, welcome to my humble abode!
Why the look of shock and awe?!
I never said I was an interior decorator!
If you're feeling a little claustrophobic, join the club!!

Well, according to you we're looking for a child who was catapulted into the Nav by a mad cow demon.
Y'know... nothing out of the ordinary.

How about I hang out here and you have a look around my Urn and see if you can find one of my warp points?
I gave up when you had to help me out of the Urn... but there has to be a working warp point around my room somewhere.
I'm feeling lazy and you seem WAY more enthused about looking around than this scrambled brain of mine.
